divs: Sighting DetailsIntensly bright light, triangular shape visible behind with binoculars, twice the size of red lights on passing plane. Visible for over 45 minutes now and still there. If you live near Castle Rock, CO look out your window! I am filing this for a friend that wishes to remain anonymous.
Summary: Intensly bright light, triangular shape visible behind with binoculars
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Castle Rock
There were no other sightings in Castle Rock on or around February 19th 2009
